title: Can Mordekaiser in the One for All spawn 5 dragons.

replies.body: Riot said there can only be one Dragon ghost.
5 Ghost tho walk back to defend 1v10.
If there can only be one dragon who is the dragon master?

> [{quoted}](name=Nijiiyo,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=FgPARoTg,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-10-12T14:35:06.385+0000)
>
> If there can only be one dragon who is the dragon master?

As for what happens when a team of Mordekaisers take dragon, L4T3NCY noted:
"Only the last Morde to apply the buff get's a Dragon. :P"
source: http://www.surrenderat20.net/2015/10/red-post-collection-be-victorious-one.html
That would be fun to track. By which I mean impossible.

4 mordekaisers in duo lanes getting full exp is more worrysome, but spawning 5 dragons at once is pree bs. dont even think about teamfighting if you dont have hard cc, if the one champion you are all playing doesnt have hard cc
